contentencoded: Lizzie O’Leary of economics show Marketplace gives us a little lesson on international economics. Specifically, which countries are handing out the most cash.

title: The World’s Most Generous Nation Revealed
teaser: Lizzie O’Leary of economics show Marketplace gives us a little lesson on international economics. Specifically, which countries are handing out the most cash.
